function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing water management strategies, reducing stagnant water in urban areas, and promoting effective waste disposal","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting fine-scale urban mosquito surveillance, improving urban disease mapping, and enhancing data collection in urban environments","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reducing carbon emissions, implementing climate change policies, and controlling mosquito populations","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enhanced surveillance at international borders, vector control programs, and public health control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air quality monitoring, wildfire prevention and control measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of pollen control measures and improved air filtration systems","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Invest in research and data collection to better understand urban health and disparities","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban design interventions and planning to optimize shading, ventilation, and thermal comfort","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of climate change mitigation strategies, focus on urban health education","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reducing carbon dioxide emissions, investing in renewable energy","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supporting adaptation efforts in vulnerable regions, international cooperation on climate change","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modifying health systems to become more resilient, investing in public health infrastructure","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide proper training, protective equipment, and support for hcp","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict cleaning protocols and regular disinfection of equipment","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on sharing best practices and continuous improvement rather than individual facility performance","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and calibration of pressure transmitters","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of manual door control systems","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of negative air machines","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Alignment with cdc and other authoritative guidelines, regular updates based on new information","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thorough review of location of restrooms, sinks, patient beds, and windows when designing partitions","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Flexible design and partitioning to create adequately sized anterooms, consideration of oblique partitions","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase the number of aiirs to meet the demand for isolation of severely affected covid-19 patients","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Select and equip large rooms with necessary medical devices and supplies for critical patient care","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Create anterooms through partitioning of existing spaces to expand the number of aiirs","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of efficient resource management and allocation strategies, development of alternative treatment methods, and international collaboration","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid expansion of aiir capacity, implementation of temporary aiirs, and development of portable isolation units","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct comprehensive analysis and prediction of virus transmission risks at an architectural scale. implement targeted preventive measures based on findings.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilize multidisciplinary knowledge and occupancy simulation to proactively understand and evaluate virus transmission risks. develop predictive models for early risk assessment.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing measures for physical distancing, cleaning and sanitization, and infection prevention and control","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing situational visualization techniques and statistical virus risk metrics to enhance awareness","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop more comprehensive visualization methods, provide additional interaction techniques, and perform multiple simulation runs","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement hybrid visualization method combining 3d visualization with temporal filters, automate view point adjustments and visualization methods based on time intervals","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perform multiple simulation runs, explore interactive visualization techniques to represent converging aspects of data","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simplify user interface, provide guided parameter optimization, and offer user training","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of a comparison assistant interface and spatio-temporal visualization tools","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of timeline-based dataset of human-building-virus interactions, development of analysis tools for cause-and-effect relationships","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combine data-driven behavior with user-supplied information, continually update and validate data, and provide explanations for the limitations of the simulation.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop simulation tools with a high level of detail that realistically simulate human-building interactions, integrate contagious disease propagation models.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct thorough validation and verification of simulated behaviors with real-world data, involve experts in human behavior and building design in the simulation process.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Invest in transparency and education about the accuracy and reliability of the simulation system, conduct user training and awareness programs.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement data-driven approach for behavior modeling, automate behavior parameter adjustment based on real occupancy data, optimize user interface and system performance.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validate the simulation results by comparing them to known outbreak scenarios or higher resolution cfd simulations","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporate airflow analysis into the simulation system, conduct cfd simulations for airflow assessment","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop a crowd behavior model for the simulation system, integrate queuing and grouping behaviors into the model","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Education and communication to increase awareness of virus transmission and safety measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of occsim to increase transparency in space occupancy and safety","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use simulated data to inform and adjust cleaning schedules and signage locations for more effective disease control.","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium"}]}
